DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Of AG-013736 Tablets In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 47 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Evidence significant disease blood , kidney , endocrine system , lung , gastrointestinal , heart , liver , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude season allergy ) . Active smoker user tobacco contain product drug Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential include tubal ligation .
